channel.title: Real Time With Bill Maher on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Real Time With Bill Maher on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Bill Maher Condemns “People Who Mocked” Charlie Kirk’s Death: “I Think You’re Gross”
item.description: The ‘Real Time’ host further addressed the widespread reaction Kirk’s assassination sparked on social media.
